name: Orange Business Live objects
description: This plugin synchronize data from Orange business live objects and Yadoms.

APIKey.name: API Key
APIKey.description: The API key is obtained from the live object Orange web site

retreiveData.name: Retreive all devices from the Orange business web site

onlyActivated.name: Retreive all activated devices from the Orange business web site

removeAllDevices.name: remove all devices registered in Yadoms

pluginState.noConnection: Could not connect to the equipment
pluginState.unauthorizedAccess: Unauthorized access, please check the APIKey
